channel.title: Travel Journal on Ed Leonardy
channel.description: Recent content in Travel Journal on Ed Leonardy

item.title: Adelaide & Kangaroo Island in 4 Days
item.description: Day 1: Hahndorf, Grange Beach, Fleurieu Peninsula We started our trip with some brunch and coffee in Adelaide, which is the second best way to start an Australian day (obviously second to yum cha, duh). Then we drove to the Hahndorf area, stopping by at Beerenberg to grab the iconic strawberry jam. (warning: do not buy honey products on the mainland if you’re planning to go to Kangaroo Islandâ€”bringing honey to the island is prohibited by strict quarantine laws to preserve the existing Kangaroo Island honey)
